title: October 8, 2019: Pundi X (NPXS): Down 0.95%
text:
Pundi X Price Update

Pundi X is down by approximately 0.95% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.0002181 USD. Yesterday’s down day is a reversal of the day before it; in terms of trend, though, note that the current price is now 21.01% below its 20 day moving average, and is currently in a down trend over the past 14 days. Traders looking for a range to trade within may wish to note that the Bollinger bands (a price indicator based on recent momentum and volatility) for Pundi X imply the currency may oscillate between $0.000215 and $0.000337, based on how price has behaved in the two weeks prior. Price’s current proximity to the bottom of the range may make buying an attractive opportunity to traders interested in trading the range.

Trade Pundi x (NPXS) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Pundi X, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $52 million.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Yesterday saw 1,378 transfers amongst holders of Pundi X. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Pundi X’s wallet count rise by 227. If we observe percentage growth in holders and transfers, we find that Pundi X ranks 7 out of the 32 Ethereum tokens we are tracking.

How are the Strong Holders of Pundi X Faring?

In terms of wealth concentration, the richest 1,000 wallets own 88.09% of the coin’s total money supply. Drilling down to just exchanges, the top 1,000 wallets that are exchanges control 12.07% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.14% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by 0%. Pundi X’s smart contract owns approximately 0.02% of its own total money supply. This amount hasn’t changed over the past week.

How Much Development is Occurring?

The last activity date on Pundi X’s GitHub repository was September 27, 2019, or about 11 days ago. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Pundi X’s GitHub repositories grow by 0 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.03.

Pundi X’s Social Media Presence

Twitter appears to be the most popular place to follow the company, and thus may be worth monitoring. Use this link to follow Pundi X on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Pundi x, listed under the symbol NPXS, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX.

Article by SixJupiter
